## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a floating-point value. This value represents the amount to change the stroke width and is specified as a percentage of the font point size. Specify `0` (the default) for no additional changes. # strokeWidth

**Type Property**

The width of the stroke.

## Declaration

```swift
static let strokeWidth: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a floating-point value. This value represents the amount to change the stroke width and is specified as a percentage of the font point size. Specify `0` (the default) for no additional changes. Specify positive values to change the stroke width alone. Specify negative values to stroke and fill the text. For example, a typical value for outlined text would be `3.0`.

## Getting rendering attribute keys

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the background behind the text.
- **baselineOffset**: The vertical offset for the position of the text.
- **font**: The font of the text.
- **foregroundColor**: The color of the text.
- **glyphInfo**: The name of a glyph info object.
- **kern**: The kerning of the text.
- **ligature**: The ligature of the text.
- **paragraphStyle**: The paragraph style of the text.
- **strikethroughColor**: The color of the strikethrough.
- **strikethroughStyle**: The strikethrough style of the text.
- **strokeColor**: The color of the stroke.
- **superscript**: The superscript of the text.
- **tracking**: The amount to modify the default tracking.
- **underlineColor**: The color of the underline.
- **underlineStyle**: The underline style of the text.
